Posts.Content: Jan 22, 2009 11:44AM kristinabergner wrote: Thanks for replying so quickly! I know about IBC & I'm glad you caught it right away. My breast looks ok, but it just feels weird & painful. SO I will get it checked out. I hope I get tested as rapidly as you! The waiting is the hardest part (that's a Tom Petty song too). My OBGYN has been on vacation so I've already had to wait (I trust her so no one else will do). I'm glad you are fighting the good fight! That's what I will do too. No choice! At least we are in it together. ~Tina

Posts.Content: Jan 23, 2009 03:41PM kristinabergner wrote: Nice hair, Lilith! Even nicer words. Worrying is not helping, I know ~ but it's hard not to. I think I wll request a genetic test no matter what this outcome. The other thing is that I have been dealing with a hip injury (broken January '08, then surgery & recovery ~still limping after 9 months on crutches) for so long & now this. My poor body! I feel as though I willnever get my life back on track. But you are an inspiration! I am relieved to be able to meet you ladies here & express my fears. Thanks so much!
